items.name: Paneer Makhanwala
items.description: A popular dish from the North Indian cuisine, made by cooking chunks of Paneer (cottage cheese) in a rich, buttery tomato-based gravy. It's a creamy and rich dish
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Creamy, buttery and flavour packed gravy with smoked grilled chicken. Topped with fresh cream and coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Makhana Chat
items.description: Makhana Chat is a popular street food from Bihar, made by mixing roasted makhana (foxnuts) with a variety of spices and chutneys, similar to a traditional chaat dish. It's a crunchy and flavorful snack

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Bhogichi Bhaji
items.description: Bhogichi Bhaji is a traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking a variety of vegetables in a spicy coconut-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Maharastrian Kala Lamb Curry
items.description: A traditional dish made with lamb cooked in a spicy black masala made with a blend of spices and coconut. It's a popular delicacy in the region
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Street style snack made of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander.

items.name: Puliohara
items.description: A popular traditional dish from Andhra Pradesh, made by cooking rice in tamarind juice with spices and seasoning it with peanuts and chana dal.

items.name: Phulkopri Dhalna
items.description: A comforting Bengali spiced curry with potato, cauliflower and green peas cooked with whole spices and tumeric
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Assamese Chicken Currry
items.description: Assamese style black sesame seed chicken is a traditional dish from the northeastern state of Assam, made by marinating chicken in a mixture of yogurt, spices and black sesame seed paste, then cooking it in a gravy with vegetables and more spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Chaat
items.description: Boiled sweet potato mixed with variey of chutneys and spices topped with fresh coianer and pomagrante

items.name: Lasuni palak kichdi
items.description: Loads of garlic and spinach cooked together with rice and lentils, onion, ginger, garlic  with variety of spices pressure cooked together.

items.name: Achari Paneer Chana Pulao
items.description: A wholesome and delicipous one pot meal that is made with fragrant basmati rice, succulent Indian cottage cheese and chickepeas cooked together with pickling spices. Served with yogurt raita, pickle and papad

items.name: Kolambi Bhat
items.description: Flavourful prawns cooked with ginger, garlic, onion and other spices combined with aromatic basmati rice and fresh coriander served wih yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Poha
items.description: Maharashtrian stype poha is made from flattened rice stir-fried with a blend of spices, potato, peanuts, and garnished with lemon juice and grated coconut.

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichdi
items.description: A traditional dish from the northern region of India, it's a one-pot dish made by cooking lentils, rice and spices together, it is a comfort food that is hearty and filling.

items.name: Veg Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with veg manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
items.description: Stir fried chicken and assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with chicken manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Paneer Chilli
items.description: Stir fried cubed paneer (cottage cheese) with diced bell peppers, onions, and chilies in a spicy and flavorful sauce. It is a popular spicy and savoury Indo-Chinese dish.

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Bihari Dum Aloo
items.description: A popular dish originating from the state of Bihar, made with baby potatoes cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy. The dish is slow-cooked on low heat to infuse the flavors, resulting in soft, melt-in-your-mouth potatoes with a tangy and spicy taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Masala
items.description: A North Indian dish made by cooking chicken in a thick, spicy onion tomato based gravy with spices and fresh garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Chapli Kebab
items.description: A dish made by mashing ground chicken with spices, herbs, and other ingredients, shaped into a patty and grilled. Served with spicy green chutney. (3 pieces)

items.name: Mumbai Style Chicken Kheema Pav
items.description: Kheema Pav is a popular street food in Mumbai, made by cooking minced chicken in a spicy tomato onion based gravy served with 2 pav/buns.

items.name: Kashmiri Nadru Yakhni
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri dish made with lotus stems cooked in a rich, flavorful yogurt-based sauce with spices. It is a slow-cooked dish that is considered a delicacy in Kashmiri cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kashmiri Chicken Curry
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish made with chicken cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy made with Kashmiri chilies, yogurt, and a blend of spices. It is a mildly spicy dish, known for its bright red color and delicious taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Poha Veg Cutlet
items.description: Made from flattened rice (poha) mixed with spices, vegetables, and sometimes potatoes, then shaped into patties and fried. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 pieces)

items.name: Misal Pav
items.description: A popular street food in Maharashtra, made with a spicy mixture of sprouted beans, vegetables in a savory broth called "kat". It is served with 2 pav and topped with chivda & farsan (fried snacks).

items.name: Alsande Usali
items.description: A popular Goan dish made with small kidney beans. A tangy spicy dish with mild and flavourful spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Chicken Xacuti
items.description: Chicken curry from the region of Goa with freshly roasted spices, vineger, coconut & chillies
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Bombay Masala Toast
items.description: A popular street food in Mumbai, India, made by spreading a mixture of spices, green chilies, and other ingredients on bread, then toasting it until crisp and golden. Served with ketchup.

items.name: Goan Ros Omlette
items.description: A popular dish from Goa, made with spicy chicken curry and topped with an omlette. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Bharli Vangi
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by stuffing baby eggplants with a spicy peanut-sesame filling and then cooking them in a tangy tomato onion based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kolhapuri Chicken Curry
items.description: Spicy and flavorful dish from the Kolhapur region of India, made with chicken cooked in a thick sauce with a blend of roasted spices and coconut. It is known for its heat and pungent flavor, making it a popular choice among those who enjoy spicy food.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Vangi Bhat
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking rice with eggplants and a blend of spices. It is a flavorful and filling dish.

items.name: Achari Paneer Channa Pulao
items.description: Chickpeas and Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, garlic, ginger and pickling spices mixed with aromatic basmati rice topped with fresh coriander. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Thalassery Biryani
items.description: A malabar style chicken biryani. Chicken cooked with cramalised onions, cashew, yogurt, spicies and coconut milk along with small grain rice, mint leaves, coriander and fried onion. Served with yogurt dip + acahar + papad.

items.name: Rajma Kebab
items.description: A vegetarian kebab made with red kidney beans mixed with potatoes, spices, chillies and shapped into round patties and shallow fried. Served with mint chutney. (4 kebabs)

items.name: Bhindi Kadhi Chawal
items.description: A vegetarian dish made with crispy okra (bhindi) and a spicy yogurt gravy (kadhi). It's a popular dish in North India. Served with rice.
